Configuring Connectivity Policy

To configure Connectivity Policy, perform the following:

 1. In the Connectivity Policy Configuration screen, select and organization from the Organization drop-down list.

By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the name of the adapter policy in the Name field.

 3. From the WWNN drop-down list, select the WWNN pool.

 4. Select a vHBA template from the vHBA drop-down list.

 5. Click Add to create a connectivity policy.

Figure 6-8 Connectivity Policy

 6. Click Save and next to proceed further.
